doc:
Mary Cadorette https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Cadorette 0 Mary Therese Cadorette (born March 31, 1957) is an American actress best known for playing John Ritter's live-in girlfriend, flight attendant Vicky Bradford on the short-lived 1984 Three's Company spin-off, Three's a Crowd. Mary_Therese Cadorette ( born March_31_,_1957 ) is an_American_actress best_known for playing John_Ritter 's_live-in_girlfriend , flight_attendant_Vicky_Bradford on the_short-lived_1984_Three 's_Company_spin-off , Three 's a_Crowd .
